purpose: Introduce Titanverse platform through Wahid's explainer video, educating pharmacy professionals on Titanverse capabilities and positioning it as the unified platform for pharmacy services.
core_message: Titanverse is the new platform we built specifically for pharmacy services. It brings everything together and uses AI to take the pressure off.
summary: Talking head + animated explainer video featuring Wahid introducing Titanverse, explaining how it solves fragmentation in pharmacy services and showcases key features (AI templates, AI scribe, digital prescribing, clinical pathways, bookings, payments, etc.).
